author: SyntheticBee
name: roletrack
short: Track and continuously report the number of members holding roles.
description: Track when the number of members holding selected roles changes, continuously updating a message summarizing the changes.
install_msg: Currently this cog is a work-in-progress so no user support is provided. Use `[p]roletrack` group commands to manage tracked role messages.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any user data.
